name: T - Lily
_source: multi_add_portrait;Emma;Right;Lily;Left
speak;Lily; Look at how far we've come from just that little town in the countryside{tgm}...
speak;Lily;Freeing, isn't it?
speak;Emma; It is{tgm}...
speak;Emma; I wish Mom had taken me out of the village years ago!
speak;Lily; Your mother is a bit of a{tgm}...
speak;Emma;A hardass?
speak;Lily;...;no_talk
speak;Lily; I was going to say worrywort.
speak;Emma; Oh, uh, yeah.{w} That's accurate too.
speak;Lily; Your mother's a tough one and has lived through a lot.{w} I doubt either of us know all of what she's had to lose.
speak;Emma; She talks about Dad sometimes, but{tgm}...{tgm}{w} I don't want to open old wounds like that.
speak;Lily; you never know.{w} Sometimes, it is the hardest memories to face that propel us to greatness.{w} It's those emotions that I encourage you to channel into your magic.
speak;Emma; Speaking of which, when are you going to teach me some more powerful magic?{w} I've been practicing the same stuff for ages!
speak;Lily; I'll teach you new techniques when you have absolute mastery over the ones you know.
speak;Emma; Fiiiineeee.
speak;Emma; But you'll see one day.{w} I'll be more powerful than you could've ever dreamed of!
remove_portrait;Emma
speak;Lily; Oh, Emma, you don't even know how right you are{tgm}...{tgm}{w} I can just sense it{tgm}...
remove_portrait;Lily
